title: Continuous Representations of Preferences by Means of Two Continuous Functions
abstract: Let $\precsim$ be a reflexive binary relation on a topological space $(X, \tau )$. A pair $(u,v)$ of continuous real-valued functions on $(X, \tau )$ is said to be a {\em continuous representation} of $\precsim$ if, for all $x,y \in X$, [$(x \precsim y \Leftrightarrow u(x) \leq v(y))$]. In this paper we provide a characterization of the existence of a continuous representation of this kind in the general case when neither the functions $u$ and $v$ nor the topological space $(X,\tau )$ are required to satisfy any particular assumptions. Such characterization is based on a suitable continuity assumption of the binary relation $\precsim$, called {\em weak continuity}. In this way, we generalize all the previous results on the continuous representability of interval orders, and also of total preorders, as particular cases.

translated_title: 通过两个连续函数进行偏好的连续表示
translated_abstract: 设$\precsim$是在拓扑空间$(X,\tau )$上的自反二元关系。若$(X,\tau )$上的实值函数对$(u,v)$被称为$\precsim$的连续表示，当且仅当对于所有的$x,y \in X$，成立[$(x \precsim y \Leftrightarrow u(x) \leq v(y))$]。在本文中，我们在一般情况下提供了这种连续表示的存在性的刻画，此时不需要函数$u$和$v$以及拓扑空间$(X,\tau )$满足任何特定的假设。这种刻画基于二元关系$\precsim$的适当连续性假设，称为“弱连续性”。通过这种方式，我们推广了所有关于区间序和总序连续表达性的先前结果，作为特殊情况。
tldr: 本文通过适当的连续性假设，提供了关于偏好连续表示存在性的一般刻画，推广了之前关于区间序和总序连续表示性的结果。
